location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 200 of 1854 from Henry Lacon Anderson, Acting Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication (No. 15) from the Resident dated 15 May 1854. In response, it conveys the approval of the Bombay Government over the guidance issued by the Resident for the company's vessels touching at Muscat.
